snippet.title: Beyond Flesh and Blood: Skyrail Manchester Trams
snippet.description:
An environment test for Deansgate , Manchester and the Skyrail in Beyond Flesh and Blood's reimagining of Manchester.

BEYOND FLESH AND BLOOD
Story-led mech shooter set in Manchester by Pixelbomb Games Limited.

STORY for Beyond Flesh and Blood : Ethan, an engineer, is sent back to a broken Earth to assist peacekeeping force, the UGR. Away from the Tree of Life, an orbital space station containing the last humans, Ethan's first real task is to survive and his original mission quickly spirals out of control.

Earth's 23rd century horrors begin to unfurl and he is forced to fight in order to control Manchester, UK - a key evac point before the Global War for resources, and a viable base for restoring comms.

Not just a hacker. Not just an engineer.

Beyond Flesh and Blood is a mech-in-mech 3PS - and Ethan's Mancunian baptism of fire..

Video edited by Jonny Pickton, Pixelbomb Games Limited 2015.

Beyond Flesh and Blood Twitter:  http://twitter.com/BeyondFBGame
Beyond Flesh and Blood Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/beyondfleshandblood1
Beyond Flesh and Blood website:  http://www.beyondfleshandbloodgame.com/wp/

http://b-fb.net
https://www.facebook.com/beyondfleshandblood1
https://wiki.unrealengine.com/Beyond_Flesh_and_Blood


"The action sees you fighting aliens and upgrading your mech from android like frames to hulking tanks and it is gory. 90s PC game gory." - Leon Hurley

"An international community of gamers on the platform Steam approved Pixelbomb Games in 2014, garnering thousands and thousands of votes in just 13 days for them to make a game all about a science-fiction version of Manchester, UK."

"For those who like their dystopias full of mechs and gore, you may find yourself interested in Beyond Flesh and Blood." - Adam Lloyd, Power Up Gaming.co.uk

--by Pixelbomb Games [2015]
